p: We analyzed bryophytes (Divisions Bryophyta and Marchantiophyta), vascular plants (Divisions Lycopodiophyta, Pteridophyta and Magnoliophyta) and arthropods (mostly from the orders Araneae, Coleoptera, Diptera, and Lepidoptera), all extensively sampled since 1980 to present over the entire archipelago. A total of 7 species of bryophytes, 50 species of vascular plants and 122 species of arthropods were used for the analysis ( S1 Table). The chosen species were all the Azorean endemic species whose distribution records for the Azores had a sufficient number of occurrence records to be modelled (15 occurrences minimum, to have at least five points per climatic variable).
